input: Type: Song, Theme: Chivalry, Style: Shakespearean
output:
Upon a steed of noble hue,
A knight doth ride in glorious view.
His armor shone with silver light,
And on his shield did emblems bright.

He spoke with courtesy and grace,
As courtiers knelt to hear him trace.
He dealt with all with gentle hand,
And treated none with base disdain.

Oh, chivalry, how thou dost shine
In hearts that love thy noble sign!
Thou teachest us to be kind,
Our conduct to improve, our honor to bind.
